context: You follow the wires to the floor of a cavernous factory. Piles of bones cover up the copper conduits, leading to an office where business was orchestrated.|||Crows fly in through the shattered windows, tearing into hatcheted bodies at your feet, while the rats feast on entrails scattered across the work belts.|||The stench is overwhelming—a nauseating mixture of copper, rot, and something acrid. Industrial. The factory hasn't been abandoned long.
option_text: You step carefully over the carnage toward the office. A massive machine with sparking electric coils is bolted to the back wall, and a scribbled note sits atop the desk.|||"The Professor shall have all the components he needs! And all we had to do was funnel the poorhouse dead to this abandoned factory. Chop, chop! Job's a good'un. But I don't understand how the generator works."|||Suddenly, the smell of burning oil fills the air, and you're surrounded by mechanised enemies.

context: You follow the wires to the floor of a cavernous factory. Piles of bones cover up the copper conduits, leading to an office where business was orchestrated.|||Crows fly in through the shattered windows, tearing into hatcheted bodies at your feet, while the rats feast on entrails scattered across the work belts.|||The stench is overwhelming—a nauseating mixture of copper, rot, and something acrid. Industrial. The factory hasn't been abandoned long.
option_text: Following the sound of arcing electricity, you discover a massive generator in the office. A metal chute is bolted to the top, spattered with gore and what appears to be bone dust.|||Beside the chute on the shelf is something that is still useful.|||Before you can ponder the workings of the machine, you hear the sound of clanking footsteps and are surrounded by mechanised enemies.
